world.entity

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.entity.Entity
      • world.entity.Bullet

  • public class Bullet
extends Entity
    A Class of Bullets extending entities Involving also a ship.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private byte bounceCounter
      A variable registering the amount of times this bullet has bounced on a worlds edge of this bullet.
      private static double bulletInitialVelocity
      A variable registering the initial velocity of a bullet.
      private static double bulletRadius
      A variable registering the radius of a bullet.
      private static double density
      A variable registering the density of a bullet.
      static byte maximumBorderBounces
      A variable registering the maximum amount of time a bullet can bounce off the boundaries of the world.
      private Ship shooter
      A variable keeping a reference to the ship which shot this bullet.

    • Method Detail

      • getInitialPosition

        protected static Position getInitialPosition(Ship ship)
        Calculates the initial position of a new bullet given the ship it is fired from.
        Parameters:
        ship - The given ship
        Returns:
        The initial position of this new bullet. (It is placed right next to the ship.) | new Position(new Vector(ship.getPosition()).getSum(ship.getDirection().getScaledBy(ship.getShape().getRadius() + bulletRadius)));

      • getShooter

        public Ship getShooter()
        Returns the shooter of this bullet.
        Returns:
        shooter

      • canHaveAsShooter

        protected static boolean canHaveAsShooter(Ship shooter)
        Checks whether this bullet can have the given shooter ship as its shooter ship.
        Parameters:
        shooter - The shooter ship to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given shooter ship is not null. | result = (shooter != null)

      • setShooter

        protected void setShooter(Ship shooter)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the shooter ship to the given shooter ship.
        Parameters:
        shooter - The given shooter ship.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given shooter is null | shooter == null

      • getBounceCounter

        public byte getBounceCounter()
        Returns the the amount of times this bullet has bounced on a worlds edge of this bullet.

      • canHaveAsBounceCounter

        protected boolean canHaveAsBounceCounter(byte bounceCounter)
        Checks whether this bullet can have the given bounceCounter as its bounceCounter.
        Parameters:
        bounceCounter - The bounceCounter to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given bounceCounter is positive. | result = (bounceCounter > 0)

      • setBounceCounter

        protected void setBounceCounter(byte bounceCounter)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the bounce counter of this bullet to the given bounce counter.
        Parameters:
        bounceCounter - The new bounce counter for this bullet.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given bounceCounter is not a valid bounce counter | !canHaveAsBounceCounter(bounceCounter)
